scripts.build:circuit:withdraw:compile: npx circom circuits/withdraw.circom -o build/circuits/withdraw.json && npx snarkjs info -c build/circuits/withdraw.json
scripts.build:circuit:withdraw:setup: npx snarkjs setup --protocol groth -c build/circuits/withdraw.json --pk build/circuits/withdraw_proving_key.json --vk build/circuits/withdraw_verification_key.json
scripts.build:circuit:withdraw:contractcopy: sed 's/\^0.5.0/>=0.5.0/g' build/circuits/WithdrawVerifier.sol | sed 's/gas/gas()/g' | sed 's/@return//g' | sed 's/contract Verifier/contract WithdrawVerifier/g' > contracts/WithdrawVerifier.sol
scripts.build:circuit:withdraw: npm run build:circuit:withdraw:compile && npm run build:circuit:withdraw:setup && npm run build:circuit:withdraw:bin && npm run build:circuit:withdraw:contract && npm run build:circuit:withdraw:contractcopy
scripts.build:circuit:send:compile: npx circom circuits/send.circom -o build/circuits/send.json && npx snarkjs info -c build/circuits/send.json
scripts.build:circuit:send:setup: npx snarkjs setup --protocol groth -c build/circuits/send.json --pk build/circuits/send_proving_key.json --vk build/circuits/send_verification_key.json
scripts.build:circuit:send:contractcopy: sed 's/\^0.5.0/>=0.5.0/g' build/circuits/SendVerifier.sol | sed 's/gas/gas()/g' | sed 's/@return//g' | sed 's/contract Verifier/contract SendVerifier/g' > contracts/SendVerifier.sol
scripts.build:circuit:send: npm run build:circuit:send:compile && npm run build:circuit:send:setup && npm run build:circuit:send:bin &&  npm run build:circuit:send:contract && npm run build:circuit:send:contractcopy
scripts.build:circuit: mkdir -p build/circuits && npm run build:circuit:withdraw && npm run build:circuit:send
scripts.build: mkdir -p build && npm run build:circuit && npm run build:contract
